unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's back? Heard he's been at the NCA in Bangalore since 20/07/2024. Hopefully, he'll be fit for the Asia Cup. Jadeja's shoulder too, remember the 2022 incident? Fingers crossed he recovers by 10/08/2024, 17:00 hrs. Also, what about young Karthik from the U-19 team? That knee injury looked nasty on 01/08/2024. Get well soon, lads! Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's back? Heard he's been at the N C A in Bangalore since twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Hopefully, he'll be fit for the Asia Cup. Jadeja's shoulder too, remember the two thousand and twenty two incident? Fingers crossed he recovers by tenth august two thousand and twenty four, five P M. Also, what about young Karthik from the U-nineteen team? That knee injury looked nasty on first august two thousand and twenty four. Get well soon, lads! Jai Hind!
